messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] ???
messages.msgSnippet: Candice- I noticed one or two of mine reposted, too. I think it s just Yahoo. Amy Mama to Accalia (6/14/99) The hardest to learn was the least complicated
messages.messageBody:
Candice-

I noticed one or two of mine reposted, too. I think it's just Yahoo.

Amy
Mama to Accalia (6/14/99)
"The hardest to learn was the least complicated" -Indigo Girls

> Does anyone know why this post I sent yesterday is reposting. I didn't resend
> it and am not trying to start anything here.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] ???
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/31/01 10:46:00 PM Pacific Standard Time, czuniga145@aol.com writes:

czuniga145@... writes:

<< Does anyone know why this post I sent yesterday is reposting. I didn't
resend
it and am not trying to start anything here.

candice
>>

Candice

It's just a glitch. There have been a few hiccups in the system while
egroups is merging with Yahoogroups. It just happened to me as well, I never
resent the post about being "pro-support" either. I'm sure most folks knew
it wasn't our doing.

Kris
